sections.heading: Wrongful refusal to consent to medical care and treatment of a childWhenever the parent or guardian of a child wrongfully refuses to consent to the medical care and treatment of his child as required by this Chapter, the physician may report the child as a child in need of care in accordance with th
sections.text: Wrongful refusal to consent to medical care and treatment of a childWhenever the parent or guardian of a child wrongfully refuses to consent to the medical care and treatment of his child as required by this Chapter, the physician may report the child as a child in need of care in accordance with the provisions of Title VI.Acts 1991, No. 235, ยง15, eff. Jan. 1, 1992.
